text: Santos de Guápiles Fútbol Club, commonly known simply as Santos, is a Costa Rican association football club, which currently plays in the Liga FPD. The club plays in Estadio Ebal Rodríguez in Guápiles, Limón, Costa Rica. ==History== The club was founded in 1961Club de Costa Rica pasará a tener dueños mexicanos – Diez and have never been league champions. They were runner-up twice, in 2001–02 and in the 2012 Verano championship. They reached the top tier after winning promotion in 1999Costa Rica 1998/99 – RSSSF after beating Municipal Liberia in a May 1999 play-off final marred by violence off the pitch.Con simpleza al cetro•El Santos se coronó campeón ante un confundido Liberia – Nación Old logo ==Stadium== Santos play their home games in the Estadio Ebal Rodríguez, where Alajuelense's Wilson Muñoz scored the first Primera División goal in a 1999 4–0 league win over the hosts.Estadio Ebal Rodríguez consiguió su gol 600 – UNAFUT ==Players== ===Player Records=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- |+Most appearances (as of May 31, 2010)Portería leal – UNAFUT |- !width=50px|# !width=150px|Name !width=100px|Career !width=50px|Apps !width=50px|Goals |- |1 ||align=left| Roy krishna || || 265 || |- |2 ||align=left| Federico Urrutia || || 214 || |- |3 ||align=left| Rónald Rodríguez || || 198 || |- |4 ||align=left| Yeinor Santamaría || || 189 || |- |5 ||align=left| Gustavo Martínez || || 185 || |- |6 ||align=left| José F.
